[[Category:Perl]]
DNA_Rev_Comp.pm
<perl>
package DNA_Rev_Comp;
use strict;
use vars qw(@ISA @EXPORT $VERSION); 
use Exporter; 
$VERSION = 1.00;
@ISA = qw(Exporter); 
@EXPORT = qw(DNA_Rev_Comp);

sub DNA_Rev_Comp {
	my $dna = $_[0];
	my $revcomp = reverse($dna);
	$revcomp =~ tr/ACGTacgt/TGCAtgca/;
	return $revcomp;
}

1;
</perl>

DNA_Rev_Comp.pl
<perl>
#!/usr/bin/perl
#use lib "./";
use DNA_Rev_Comp;

$a = "CAGCTATCTATCAC";
$b = DNA_Rev_Comp($a);
warn $b;
</perl>
